description: Packed full of meat and spices, these lamb koftas are great with a mezze plate.
keywords: Kofta,Seafood free,Gluten free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Dairy free
name: Spicy Lamb Koftas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the mince with the spices and combine fully.
Add the chopped onion and garlic and then shape the mixture into balls.
Chargrill the balls on a medium heat for 10 minutes while turning occasionally and serve with a choice of condiments.
